flowchart-simple.name: Simple Flowchart
flowchart-simple.use_case: Basic process flows with 3-5 steps, simple decision points
flowchart-simple.best_for: Linear processes, simple decision trees, step-by-step guides

mindmap-basic.name: Basic Mind Map
mindmap-basic.use_case: Brainstorming with central concept and 3-5 main branches
mindmap-basic.best_for: Idea exploration, concept mapping, creative thinking sessions

mindmap-complex.name: Complex Mind Map
mindmap-complex.use_case: Multi-level thinking with 5+ main branches and sub-branches
mindmap-complex.best_for: Deep analysis, comprehensive planning, multi-faceted problems

architecture-3tier.name: 3-Tier Architecture
architecture-3tier.use_case: Traditional web application with presentation, logic, and data layers
architecture-3tier.best_for: Web applications, client-server systems, layered architectures

architecture-microservices.name: Microservices Architecture
architecture-microservices.use_case: Distributed systems with multiple services and APIs
architecture-microservices.best_for: Scalable systems, cloud-native apps, service-oriented architecture

timeline-horizontal.name: Horizontal Timeline
timeline-horizontal.use_case: Linear roadmap with milestones and phases
timeline-horizontal.best_for: Product roadmaps, project timelines, release schedules

timeline-gantt.name: Gantt-Style Timeline
timeline-gantt.use_case: Project plan with overlapping tasks and dependencies
timeline-gantt.best_for: Complex projects, task tracking, dependency management

wireframe-desktop.name: Desktop Wireframe
wireframe-desktop.best_for: Web applications, dashboard layouts, desktop interfaces

flowchart.description: Sequential processes with decision points and flow control

mindmap.description: Radial concept exploration with central idea and branches

timeline.description: Chronological sequence of events or milestones
